'''"Steady Stately Stability"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Steady Stately Stability" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest to the west of the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]] after defeating two [[Recon Log Mek]] - Pneuma.
